data.name: The Gift
data.description:
Let go of negative thoughts and feelings with empowering self-guided coaching experiences. Try your unique coaching experience now!

Benefits
- Release the source of your anxiety, fear and stress from your mind and body
- Release negative self talk that keeps you from having what you want
- Find answers to your own personal problems 
- Energize yourself when feeling tired
 
What people say
"I have been far more at peace about the path I am on and feel more “whole” despite the losses I have recently faced"
"I feel like it was a weight that lifted from me by the end of it"
"I truly feel both relaxed and invigorated"

changelog.change_log:
- minor bug fixes

- updated problem object pullout experience

NEW! Hilltop Scene
Minor bug fixes.
New Zen Garden scene added. New UI updates upon new login, in addition to tip cards if anyone gets stuck on any step. Misc bug updates.
Fixed healing gift frame bug. Minor performance updates.
Enjoy the new login feature and smooth improved performance

New forest environment! Replaces the red planet environment.
New loading animation added! Now no one should wonder if something is loading or if the app froze.

General Improvements:
- Glitter frame can now be grabbed from any point. No more teleporting into your hand at the bottom part.
- Updated some guide orb dialogues and sound effects. 
- Guide orb appearance has been updated! Lot more movement 
- Hands now have a special healing effect in certain parts.
- Added new effect to breathing exercise in the beginning.

*Upgraded healing glitter animation to improve FPS performance

* Guidance trail for spin direction

*Tips card: audio guidance for how to play the experience best

*Sit or stand option: seamlessly switch between sitting and standing during the experience - no buttons to press.

*Spaces feature: choose between 5 spaces that matches how you feel. 

*Improved stability: more fluid and seamless experience  

*Dynamic environment: minor animations, graphics  and haptics improvements at key moments. 

*Full or Short guidance: choose between the amount of guidance you want from the Guide Orb.

*Feedback feature: Leave constructive audio feedback for the developer team at the end of your session to help improve the experience even more. 

* Guidance highlight trail to visualize spin direction of negative feeling

*updated healing animation for more consistent FPS*

Beta release of The Gift a HorizonMind experience based on Dynamic Spin Release (TM) by Kris and Tim Hallbom.
